messages.title: CRIME AND SAFETY
messages.content: For the first time a government can proudly say we've put more police officers on the street. Safer Neighbourhood Police teams have been introduced into every area of this constituency and their priorities are set by local residents.

messages.title: THE NHS
messages.content: I lost my mother to cancer and I will fight to ensure that anyone who is suspected of having cancer is seen and diagnosed by a consultant within 2 weeks of visiting their GP. Labour plans to reduce this to 1 week as soon as we are able.

messages.title: EDUCATION
messages.content: Over the past 13 years Labour has been fixing the roofs of schools like Derwentwater and completely rebuilding others such as John Perryn, Grange and Acton High. During this time we have doubled investment in education.

messages.title: THE ECONOMY
messages.content: We have been working hard to support the economic recovery. Experts agree that Tory plans to slash public spending and cut vital services immediately would seriously damage the economic recovery, both now and for the future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce Safer Neighbourhood Police teams throughout the constituency with priorities set by local residents.
Ensure cancer diagnosis by a consultant within 2 weeks of GP visit and reduce this to 1 week.
Continue repairing and rebuilding schools, doubling investment in education.
Support the economic recovery and avoid immediate public spending cuts that would damage it.

issues.economy: We have been working hard to support the economic recovery. Experts agree that Tory plans to slash public spending and cut vital services immediately would seriously damage the economic recovery, both now and for the future.
issues.education: Over the past 13 years Labour has been fixing the roofs of schools like Derwentwater and completely rebuilding others such as John Perryn, Grange and Acton High. During this time we have doubled investment in education.
issues.health: I lost my mother to cancer and I will fight to ensure that anyone who is suspected of having cancer is seen and diagnosed by a consultant within 2 weeks of visiting their GP. Labour plans to reduce this to 1 week as soon as we are able.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is the most important for a generation. The choice you make now will make a huge difference both locally and nationally for years to come. Every vote is always important - this time it's vital.

contactInformation.address: Ruskin Hall, 16 Church Road, Acton, W3 8PP

endorsements.endorsement: In this election the British people will make a historic choice about the future they want for Britain. Tories threaten an age of austerity - a change you cannot afford. I am fighting for a future fair for all.

quotes.text: In this election the British people will make a historic choice about the future they want for Britain. Tories threaten an age of austerity - a change you cannot afford. I am fighting for a future fair for all.

Bassam Mahfouz with Gordon Brown and others.
